snippet.title: LORN E3 Trailer - Survival Horror (PS4, Xbox One, PC, Q4 2018)
snippet.description:
New trailer for our upcoming survival horror game Lorn.

Lorn will be coming to PC, Xbox One and PS4.

We are aiming for a release sometime in Q4 2018, however this is subject to change depending on development/testing and certification time.

Soon we will release detailed gameplay footage; just a few more tweaks to go ;-)

Check out the new website and new screenshots at:
http://www.lorngame.com


Spoken Dialogue in trailer:

"Ambiguous bigot of a forlorn world.

You seek to extinguish the flame?

The pursuit of ascendancy.

I, servant of the King.

Murderer of innocents.

The Eater of Hope.

I... am... Nithe…."



Powered by Unreal Engine 4

Rated M for:
Intense Violence
Blood and Gore
